banner.title: Cookie consent
banner.text: We and our partners, including Shopify, use cookies and other technologies to personalize your experience, show you ads, and perform analytics, and we will not use cookies or other technologies for these purposes unless you accept them. Learn more in our

preferences.title: Cookie and privacy preferences
preferences.introText: Learn more about the cookies we use, and choose which cookies to allow.

bulletPoints.title: If you accept all cookies
bulletPoints.firstText: Our site may be improved based on your interests
bulletPoints.secondText: Your preferences may be stored for when you return
bulletPoints.thirdText: You may see advertising that's tailored to you

purposes.essentialDesc: These cookies are necessary for the site to function properly, including capabilities like logging in and adding items to the cart.
purposes.performanceDesc: These cookies help us understand how you interact with the site. We use this data to identify areas to improve.
purposes.preferencesDesc: These cookies store details about your actions to personalize your next visit to the website.
purposes.marketingDesc: These cookies are used by us and our partners, including Shopify, to optimize marketing communications and show you ads on other websites.
